rows.name: intro_text
rows.value:
These pathways give suggested paths through which each area can be taught. These are only suggestions, and many variations are possible. It is useful to see each topic in context – which topics lead to it and which topics follow from it.

Click on a button to learn more about an individual topic.

rows.name: info_props_geom
rows.value: This will be an introduction to object properties and geometry.

rows.name: info_quants_counts
rows.value: This will be an introduction to quantities and counting.

rows.name: info_single_add_sub
rows.value: This will be an introduction to single-digit adding and subtracting.

rows.name: info_single_mult_div
rows.value: This will be an introduction to single-digit multiplying and dividing.
